name: Unitiv
overview:
Unitiv, Inc. is a professional provider of enterprise IT solutions. Unitiv delivers its services from its headquarters in Alpharetta, Georgia, USA, and its regional office in Iselin, New Jersey, USA.

Unitiv provides a strategic approach to its service delivery, focusing on three core components: People, Products, and Process. The People to advise and manage complex technical solutions. The Products to design and build customized IT solutions. The Process to develop and manage post-implementation operations.

Unitiv provides enterprise IT solutions that include Multi-Vendor Support, Server Infrastructure, Storage Infrastructure, Disaster Recovery Planning, and Network Performance Optimizationâ€”all supported by Unitivâ€™s Intelligent Help DeskTM. Unitiv supports green initiatives to reduce environmental impact and to cut costs by increasing efficiencies and reducing waste as well as supporting environmentally sustainable products and services.
